analysis.description:
Reentrancy in FlairDrop.airDrop (/unique_chucks/24/0xb75e0b03a116ec81ef8c45ddce8a2e049dd5216e.sol#219-256):
	External calls:
	- allowance = parentContract.allowance(msg.sender,flairdrop) (/unique_chucks/24/0xb75e0b03a116ec81ef8c45ddce8a2e049dd5216e.sol#230-233)
	External calls sending eth:
	- buyTokens() (/unique_chucks/24/0xb75e0b03a116ec81ef8c45ddce8a2e049dd5216e.sol#221)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/24/0xb75e0b03a116ec81ef8c45ddce8a2e049dd5216e.sol#250-253)
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/24/0xb75e0b03a116ec81ef8c45ddce8a2e049dd5216e.sol#253)

FlairDrop.airDrop (/unique_chucks/24/0xb75e0b03a116ec81ef8c45ddce8a2e049dd5216e.sol#219-256) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-parentContract.transferFrom(msg.sender,target,amount) (/unique_chucks/24/0xb75e0b03a116ec81ef8c45ddce8a2e049dd5216e.sol#245-246)

FlairDrop.airDrop has external calls inside a loop:
	- parentContract.transferFrom(msg.sender,target,amount) (/unique_chucks/24/0xb75e0b03a116ec81ef8c45ddce8a2e049dd5216e.sol#245-246)

ERC20TokenInterface.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/24/0xb75e0b03a116ec81ef8c45ddce8a2e049dd5216e.sol#33)
ERC20TokenInterface.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/24/0xb75e0b03a116ec81ef8c45ddce8a2e049dd5216e.sol#31-32)
ERC20TokenInterface.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/24/0xb75e0b03a116ec81ef8c45ddce8a2e049dd5216e.sol#32-33)
ERC20TokenInterface.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/24/0xb75e0b03a116ec81ef8c45ddce8a2e049dd5216e.sol#35)

Different versions of Solidity is used in /unique_chucks/24/0xb75e0b03a116ec81ef8c45ddce8a2e049dd5216e.sol:
	- Version used: ['^0.4.24', 'v0.5.0']
	- /unique_chucks/24/0xb75e0b03a116ec81ef8c45ddce8a2e049dd5216e.sol#1 declares pragma solidity^0.4.24
	- /unique_chucks/24/0xb75e0b03a116ec81ef8c45ddce8a2e049dd5216e.sol#45-46 declares pragma experimentalv0.5.0
Parameter '_owner' of BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/24/0xb75e0b03a116ec81ef8c45ddce8a2e049dd5216e.sol#95-99) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of BasicToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/24/0xb75e0b03a116ec81ef8c45ddce8a2e049dd5216e.sol#78-79) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of BasicToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/24/0xb75e0b03a116ec81ef8c45ddce8a2e049dd5216e.sol#79) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of ERC20Token.allowance (/unique_chucks/24/0xb75e0b03a116ec81ef8c45ddce8a2e049dd5216e.sol#175-176) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of ERC20Token.allowance (/unique_chucks/24/0xb75e0b03a116ec81ef8c45ddce8a2e049dd5216e.sol#176) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of ERC20Token.approve (/unique_chucks/24/0xb75e0b03a116ec81ef8c45ddce8a2e049dd5216e.sol#148-149) is not in mixedCase

Parameter '_to' of ERC20Token.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/24/0xb75e0b03a116ec81ef8c45ddce8a2e049dd5216e.sol#126-127) is not in mixedCase
